title: I don't get it why people dislike Lux.
body:
She is one of the few mages that doesn't instantly make me puke.

The only annoying thing about her is her laugh and her ability to 100-0 from the Fog of War if you have no vision over her or if you get caught in a Light Binding for some reason.

At least she doesn't have bullshit in her kit unlike Ahri and her precious Spirit Rush.
